comment: She is a very helpful professor, she gives you plenty of chances to be successful in her class. Tests are open notes and she offers bonus points. Homework can be tedious but it is helpful. Final is extremely easy. I would take her again!

I took her Stat class as a Hybrid.  She was awesome but to me the end of the course was hard.  She gives a lot of help with your grade, many opportunities to pass. The homework and quizzes count more then the tests to take some pressure off because math is the devil.

Best Stats teacher ever! This was a hybrid course, so we learned material on our own and she would explain it in class. 3 exams, 1 final divided into 2 parts. Funny, and entertaining. Homework is mandatory to do, 10 quizzes. Easy A

Her course is designed for you to pass.  She's very helpful and explain anything over and over again until you understand it.  Allows a cheatsheet front and back.  Setups exam so you can pass as long as you try.  Must keep up with homework and quizzes, hw can be done as many times until you achieve 100, but not easy, quizzes are easy.   Take Her!!!

She's awkward and quirky, which makes her classes interesting. Took as a hybrid, so attendance is taken every week and required to pass. Homework is due before each of the 3 tests, and final replaces the lowest of the 3 test grades. This god sent from heaven allows a full page front and back cheat sheet for every test, so tests are EASY. TAKE HER!!

She's the ideal professor in my opinion. Very open to student feedback and is willing to alter things to accommodate the majority opinion of the class and will go out of her way to answer any questions you have and returns emails promptly. Awesome professor, I would definitely take her again!
I loved Prof Varjasi! She is smart, kind and very funny.3 quizzes, 1 final and homework. I would recommend her.

I Loved Anna. She was very nice and very funny! There was a quiz atleast once a week. and there were three tests. one was take home and on another you could have a cheat sheet. the final was very easy and half was take home and she pretty much gave you the other half in a study guide. I Would take her again and recommend her!
